title: TTC: Transformer-based TDE Classifier for the Wide Field Survey Telescope (WFST)
summary: We propose the Transformer-based Tidal disruption events (TDE) Classifier (\texttt{TTC}), specifically designed to operate effectively with both real-time alert streams and archival data of the Wide Field Survey Telescope (WFST).
